collections.name: Case Studies
collections.description: Client success stories demonstrating ArcaScience platform impact across therapeutic areas and development phases.

fields.name: Title
fields.helpText: The case study headline. Use a specific, outcome-oriented title (e.g., 'Reducing Signal Detection Time by 60% in Oncology').

fields.name: Client
fields.helpText: Client company name. Use the official legal name or approved short name. If anonymized, use a descriptor like 'Top 10 Global Pharma Company'.

fields.name: Therapeutic Area
fields.helpText: Reference to the Therapeutic Areas collection. Select the primary therapeutic area for this case study.

fields.name: Development Phase
fields.helpText: The drug development phase this case study covers.

fields.name: Challenge
fields.helpText: Describe the client's problem or challenge before using ArcaScience. Include specific pain points, regulatory context, and scale of the issue. 2-4 paragraphs recommended.

fields.name: Approach
fields.helpText: Describe how ArcaScience's platform was applied to solve the challenge. Reference specific modules (Data Intelligence, Decision Intelligence, Automated Outputs) where applicable. 2-4 paragraphs recommended.

fields.name: Outcome
fields.helpText: Describe the measurable results and business impact. Include quantified improvements (time saved, cost reduced, signals detected). 2-4 paragraphs recommended.

fields.name: Key Metric Number
fields.helpText: The primary quantified outcome as a number (e.g., 60 for '60% faster'). This is displayed as the hero metric on the case study card.

fields.name: Key Metric Label
fields.helpText: Label describing the key metric (e.g., '% Faster Signal Detection', 'Days Saved Per Cycle', '% Cost Reduction'). Displayed alongside the key metric number.

fields.name: Featured Image
fields.helpText: Hero image for the case study. Use WebP format, minimum 1200x630px for social sharing. Avoid stock photos; prefer data visualizations, abstract graphics, or approved client imagery.

fields.name: Published Date
fields.helpText: The publication date of this case study. Used for sorting and display. Set to the date the case study is approved for publication.

fields.name: Is Featured
fields.helpText: Toggle ON to feature this case study on the homepage and at the top of the Case Studies hub. Only 1-2 case studies should be featured at any time.

fields.name: Slug
fields.helpText: URL-friendly identifier for this case study. Use lowercase with hyphens (e.g., 'oncology-signal-detection-60-percent-faster'). This becomes the page URL path.

collections.name: Team Members
collections.description: ArcaScience team members including leadership, engineering, science, operations, and advisory board members.

fields.name: Name
fields.helpText: Full name of the team member (e.g., 'Dr. Sarah Chen'). Include professional prefixes (Dr., Prof.) where applicable.

fields.name: Title
fields.helpText: Professional title at ArcaScience (e.g., 'Chief Medical Officer', 'Senior Data Scientist', 'VP of Engineering').

fields.name: Bio
fields.helpText: Professional biography. Include relevant experience, domain expertise, education, and notable achievements. 1-3 paragraphs. Write in third person.

fields.name: Headshot
fields.helpText: Professional headshot photo. Use WebP format, minimum 400x400px, square aspect ratio. Consistent lighting and neutral background across all team photos.

fields.name: LinkedIn URL
fields.helpText: Full LinkedIn profile URL (e.g., 'https://www.linkedin.com/in/username'). Leave blank if the team member prefers not to share.

fields.name: Department
fields.helpText: The department or group this team member belongs to. Used for filtering on the Team page.

fields.name: Display Order
fields.helpText: Numeric sort order for display within the team member's department. Lower numbers appear first. Use increments of 10 (10, 20, 30) to allow easy reordering.

fields.name: Is Leadership
fields.helpText: Toggle ON if this person is a member of the executive leadership team (C-suite, VPs). Leadership members are displayed in the prominent leadership section.

fields.name: Is Advisory Board
fields.helpText: Toggle ON if this person is an advisory board member. Advisory board members are displayed in a separate section with a distinct layout.

collections.name: Resources
collections.description: Content library including blog posts, whitepapers, case studies, webinars, and regulatory updates. Supports gated and ungated content.

fields.name: Title
fields.helpText: Resource title. Be specific and outcome-oriented. Avoid generic titles like 'An Introduction to...' in favor of 'How [Specific Approach] Achieves [Specific Result]'.

fields.name: Type
fields.helpText: The content format of this resource. Determines display template and filtering on the Resource hub.

fields.name: Topic Tags
fields.helpText: Select one or more topics from the Topics collection. Used for filtering and recommending related content. Select all that apply.

fields.name: Therapeutic Area
fields.helpText: Select one or more therapeutic areas from the Therapeutic Areas collection. Used for filtering resources by therapeutic focus.

fields.name: Author
fields.helpText: Reference to the Team Members collection. Select the primary author. Their name, headshot, and title will be displayed on the resource page.

fields.name: Excerpt
fields.helpText: A concise 1-2 sentence summary of the resource. Displayed on resource cards in the hub and in search results. Maximum 200 characters recommended.

fields.name: Body
fields.helpText: The full content of the resource. Supports headings, lists, images, and embedded media. For gated content, this is revealed after form submission.

fields.name: Published Date
fields.helpText: Publication date. Used for sorting (newest first) and displayed on the resource page. Set to the approved publication date.

fields.name: Reading Time
fields.helpText: Estimated reading time in minutes (e.g., 5 for a blog post, 15 for a whitepaper). Displayed on resource cards to set reader expectations.

fields.name: Is Featured
fields.helpText: Toggle ON to feature this resource prominently on the Resource hub and homepage. Limit to 2-3 featured resources at any time.

fields.name: Is Gated
fields.helpText: Toggle ON to require form submission (email capture) before showing the full content. Typically ON for whitepapers and webinars, OFF for blog posts.

fields.name: Download File
fields.helpText: Uploadable PDF or document file for downloadable resources (whitepapers, reports). Leave empty for blog posts and webinars. Maximum file size 25MB.

fields.name: Thumbnail
fields.helpText: Thumbnail image displayed on resource cards in the hub. Use WebP format, minimum 600x400px (3:2 aspect ratio). Should visually indicate the content type.

collections.name: Therapeutic Areas
collections.description: Therapeutic areas where ArcaScience provides data coverage and pharmacovigilance intelligence. Referenced by Case Studies and Resources.
usedOn: Filters on Case Studies and Resources

fields.name: Name
fields.helpText: Official therapeutic area name (e.g., 'Oncology', 'Immunology', 'Rare Diseases', 'Cardiovascular'). Use industry-standard terminology.

fields.name: Slug
fields.helpText: URL-friendly identifier (e.g., 'oncology', 'rare-diseases'). Lowercase, hyphens only. This becomes the page URL path.

fields.name: Description
fields.helpText: A concise 1-2 sentence description of ArcaScience's capabilities in this therapeutic area. Displayed on cards and as meta description. Maximum 200 characters.

fields.name: Icon SVG Code
fields.helpText: Raw SVG markup for the therapeutic area icon. Paste the full <svg>...</svg> code. Icons should be monochrome and work at 24x24px. Used inline via Webflow Embed elements.

fields.name: Case Study Count
fields.helpText: Number of published case studies in this therapeutic area. Update manually when new case studies are published. Displayed as a credibility signal on TA pages.

fields.name: Data Coverage Description
fields.helpText: Detailed description of ArcaScience's data coverage, signal detection capabilities, and regulatory intelligence for this therapeutic area. Supports headings, lists, and formatting.

fields.name: Hero Image
fields.helpText: Hero image for the therapeutic area detail page. Use WebP format, minimum 1200x600px. Prefer abstract scientific imagery or data visualizations over stock photos.

collections.name: Open Positions
collections.description: Job listings for ArcaScience careers page. Supports multiple departments, locations, and employment types.

fields.name: Title
fields.helpText: Job title (e.g., 'Senior Data Engineer', 'Pharmacovigilance Scientist', 'Product Designer'). Use the official title from the hiring plan.

fields.name: Department
fields.helpText: The department this position belongs to. Used for filtering on the Careers page.

fields.name: Location
fields.helpText: Work location (e.g., 'Remote - US', 'San Francisco, CA', 'London, UK', 'Hybrid - Boston, MA'). Be specific about remote/hybrid/onsite.

fields.name: Type
fields.helpText: Employment type for this position.

fields.name: Description
fields.helpText: Full job description including role overview, responsibilities, and what the candidate will work on. Use headings and bullet lists for readability.

fields.name: Requirements
fields.helpText: Required and preferred qualifications, skills, and experience. Separate 'Required' and 'Nice to Have' with subheadings. Use bullet lists.

fields.name: Apply URL
fields.helpText: External URL to the application form (e.g., Greenhouse, Lever, or Ashby link). Must be a full URL starting with https://.

fields.name: Is Active
fields.helpText: Toggle ON for currently open positions. Toggle OFF to hide from the Careers page without deleting the listing. Only active positions are displayed.

fields.name: Posted Date
fields.helpText: The date this position was posted. Used for sorting (newest first) and to show how recently the position was listed.

collections.name: Topics
collections.description: Taxonomy tags for categorizing Resources. Enables filtering and discovery of related content across the resource library.

fields.name: Name
fields.helpText: Topic name (e.g., 'Signal Detection', 'ICSR Processing', 'AI/ML in Pharmacovigilance', 'Regulatory Compliance'). Use concise, industry-recognized terminology.

fields.name: Slug
fields.helpText: URL-friendly identifier (e.g., 'signal-detection', 'icsr-processing'). Lowercase, hyphens only. Used in filter URLs on the Resource hub.

fields.name: Description
fields.helpText: Brief description of this topic (1-2 sentences). Displayed as a tooltip or description text on the Resource hub filter panel. Maximum 200 characters.

collections.name: Regulatory Updates
collections.description: Tracking regulatory changes from major bodies (FDA, EMA, PMDA, ICH, CIOMS) that impact pharmacovigilance practices and ArcaScience platform capabilities.

fields.name: Title
fields.helpText: Headline for the regulatory update (e.g., 'FDA Updates FAERS Reporting Requirements for 2026'). Be specific about the change and regulatory body.

fields.name: Regulatory Body
fields.helpText: The regulatory authority or standards organization that issued this update.

fields.name: Guideline Reference
fields.helpText: Official guideline or document reference number (e.g., 'ICH E2B(R3)', 'FDA Guidance 2024-12345', 'EMA/CHMP/ICH/287/1995'). Used for precise identification.

fields.name: Impact Summary
fields.helpText: A concise 2-3 sentence plain-language summary of the regulatory change and its practical impact on pharmacovigilance operations. Displayed on cards and in the feed.

fields.name: Full Analysis
fields.helpText: Detailed analysis of the regulatory update including background, what changed, impact on industry practices, how ArcaScience addresses the change, and recommended actions. Supports full formatting.

fields.name: Published Date
fields.helpText: The date this regulatory update analysis was published. Used for sorting (newest first) in the regulatory feed.

fields.name: Related Resources
fields.helpText: Select related resources (blog posts, whitepapers) from the Resources collection that provide additional context or analysis on this regulatory topic.

collections.name: FAQ Items
collections.description: Frequently asked questions organized by category. Used in accordion components across multiple pages.

fields.name: Question
fields.helpText: The question as a customer would ask it. Write in natural language, ending with a question mark (e.g., 'How does ArcaScience handle GDPR compliance for patient data?').

fields.name: Answer
fields.helpText: The complete answer. Use paragraphs, bullet lists, and bold text for readability. Keep answers concise but thorough. Link to relevant pages where appropriate.

fields.name: Category
fields.helpText: The FAQ category. Used for filtering and grouping questions into sections on the FAQ page.

fields.name: Display Order
fields.helpText: Numeric sort order within the category. Lower numbers appear first. Use increments of 10 (10, 20, 30) to allow easy reordering without renumbering.

collections.name: Conferences & Events
collections.description: Industry conferences, trade shows, and events where ArcaScience has a presence. Displayed on the Events page and homepage.

fields.name: Name
fields.helpText: Official event name (e.g., 'DIA 2026 Global Annual Meeting', 'ISPE Annual Meeting', 'Drug Safety Symposium 2026'). Use the full official name.

fields.name: Date
fields.helpText: Event start date and time. Used for sorting (soonest first for upcoming events) and display on event cards.

fields.name: End Date
fields.helpText: Event end date. If the event spans multiple days, set this to the final day. Leave empty for single-day events.

fields.name: Location
fields.helpText: Event venue and city (e.g., 'Moscone Center, San Francisco, CA' or 'Virtual'). Be specific for in-person events.

fields.name: Description
fields.helpText: Description of ArcaScience's participation in the event. Include details about presentations, demos, speaking sessions, or panel discussions. 1-3 paragraphs.

fields.name: Booth Info
fields.helpText: Booth or exhibit hall details (e.g., 'Booth #1234, Hall B'). Leave empty if ArcaScience is attending but not exhibiting.

fields.name: Registration URL
fields.helpText: External URL to the event registration or landing page. Must be a full URL starting with https://. Leave empty if registration is closed.

fields.name: Is Upcoming
fields.helpText: Toggle ON for upcoming/future events. Toggle OFF for past events. Only upcoming events are shown in the 'Upcoming Events' sections. Update after event concludes.

collections.name: Client Logos
collections.description: Company logos for the client trust bar, partner section, and investor acknowledgments. Supports grayscale-to-color hover effect.

fields.name: Company Name
fields.helpText: Official company name. Used as alt text for the logo image (accessibility) and for internal identification in the CMS.

fields.name: Logo
fields.helpText: Full-color company logo. Use SVG or transparent PNG format, minimum 200px wide. Should have transparent background for flexibility on different page backgrounds.

fields.name: Logo Grayscale
fields.helpText: Grayscale version of the company logo for the default state in the logo bar. Use same dimensions as the color logo. The CSS applies grayscale filter on hover to reveal color, but a pre-made grayscale version ensures quality.

fields.name: Display Order
fields.helpText: Numeric sort order in the logo bar. Lower numbers appear first (left). Use increments of 10 (10, 20, 30) for easy reordering.

fields.name: Is Featured on Homepage
fields.helpText: Toggle ON to display this logo in the homepage trust bar. Limit to 6-8 logos on the homepage for a clean layout. All logos appear on the About page regardless.

fields.name: Relationship Type
fields.helpText: The type of business relationship with this company. Determines which section the logo appears in on the About page.
